headline: Adobe Stock: Analyst Estimates & Ratings
summary: Adobe has underperformed the broader market over the past year, but analysts are cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: SEMrush Stockholders Approve Adobe Acquisition Deal at Special Meeting, Back Merger Pay Plan
summary: SEMrush (NYSE:SEMR) held a special meeting of stockholders on Feb. 3, 2026, where investors voted on proposals related to the company’s planned acquisition by Adobe Inc. The meeting, chaired by Chief Executive Officer Bill Wagner, was conducted virtually and included directors Mark Vranesh, Caroline

headline: Adobe And Cognizant AI Push Tests Content Growth And Valuation Gap
summary: Adobe and Cognizant have expanded their partnership to bring generative AI into large-scale enterprise content creation and governance. The collaboration focuses on using Adobe's AI platforms to help organizations manage content supply chains, improve efficiency, and tighten controls. The move comes as enterprises face rising demand for personalized content and stricter requirements around compliance and brand consistency. Adobe, listed as NasdaqGS:ADBE, is working on this AI push while its...
